abstract: Sunday's crash of race car driver Dan Wheldon brings back memories of another popular driver who died on the track, Dale Earnhardt.
snippet: Sunday's crash of race car driver Dan Wheldon brings back memories of another popular driver who died on the track, Dale Earnhardt.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing

lead_paragraph: An accomplished and popular race car driver, Dan Wheldon, died in a 15-car crash on Sunday at a 300-mile IndyCar Series in Las Vegas. The car driven by Mr. Wheldon, 33, flew into the air and crashed into the fence on the 12th lap of a 200 lap race.

headline.main: Recalling the Death of No. 3, Dale Earnhardt
